coding_practice.title: Top K Frequent Elements
coding_practice.description: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements. You may return the answer in any order.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= nums.length <= 10^5
-10^4 <= nums[i] <= 10^4
k is in the range [1, the number of unique elements in the array].
It is guaranteed that the answer is unique.
coding_practice.follow_up: Your algorithm's time complexity must be better than O(n log n), where n is the array's size.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 Counter 統計每個元素出現的頻率。
2. 使用 heapq.nlargest 找出頻率最高的 k 個元素。
3. 返回這些元素即可，順序不限。
